rationale: Badis corycaeus is found in streams and in Indawgyi Lake, Myanmar. Its population and range extension needs to be studied properly. It is assessed as Data Deficient as threats to the species, its habitat in Indawgyi Lake need to be further investigated, and the species distribution better understood.
evaluator: Chaudhry, S., Britz, R., Allen, D.J., Datta, N.C., Dey, S.C. & Jha, B.R.
